Mafiosi
The mafiosi choose a person to kill every night. The victim will be selected randomly from those the mafiosi choose.
Detectives

The detectives choose a person to learn about (have their alignment, mafia or civilian, revealed) every night. If there is more than one, they work separately, not knowing who the other detectives are.
Double Agent*
The double agent can kill one person and save one person per game.
Bodyguards
The bodyguards choose a person to protect from the mafia every night. The saved person will be selected randomly from those the bodyguards choose.
Bomber*
The bomber selects a target at the beginning of the round. If the bomber dies during the round, the target will die too.
Civilians
Civilians don\'t do anything at night.
Matchmaker*
At the beginning of the game, the matchmaker chooses two people to be in love. If one of them dies, the other will also.
Official*
The official chooses a person at night. That person\'s vote will count double the next day.
Suspects
The suspects are normal civilians; however, when investigated by a detective, they appear to be mafia.
Journalist*
The journalist is a normal civilian; however, if killed, roles will no longer be announced when other players are killed.
